Package de.fenvariel.maven.gettext

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGettextMojo  
    DistMojo
    Generates ressource bundles.
    GettextMojo
    Invokes xgettext to extract messages from source code and store them in the keys.pot file.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on gettext-maven-plugin.
    LoggerStreamConsumer  
    MergeMojo
    Invokes msgmerge to update po files.
    ReportMojo
    Goal that generates a report.
